body_html:
I've just run into a similar-looking problem too, downloading the latest version of TensorFlow (Linux, x86_64, no-GPU, Python 3.4). In my case, downloading separately via curl didn't work either, and I got an error:

curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: certificate is not yet valid

Not yet valid??

In short, the problem was my VM's clock was way behind. Resyncing my VM's clock fixed the problem.

body:
I've just run into a similar-looking problem too, downloading the latest version of TensorFlow (Linux, x86_64, no-GPU, Python 3.4). In my case, downloading separately via curl didn't work either, and I got an error:

```
curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: certificate is not yet valid
```

Not yet valid??

In short, the problem was my VM's clock was way behind. Resyncing my VM's clock fixed the problem.
